entities.name: ElizaOS
entities.description: An open-source framework for building on-chain AI agents across blockchain platforms. It focuses on cloud infrastructure development, Modular Containerized Programs (MCPs) integration, and an API key and credit system.

entities.name: MCPs
entities.description: Modular Containerized Programs. These are components integrated within the ElizaOS framework to extend its functionality, particularly for monetization through payment rails.

entities.name: Shaw
entities.description: A user involved in technical discussions regarding ElizaOS model API design patterns.

entities.name: cjft
entities.description: A user involved in technical discussions regarding ElizaOS model API design patterns.

entities.name: ai16z
entities.description: The main token of the ElizaOS project.

entities.name: daos.fun
entities.description: A platform or service whose design is related to issues with the ai16z token. Further research is needed to define its core function.

entities.name: Odilitime
entities.description: A user who provided information about the ai16z token problem being a daos.fun design issue.

entities.name: n8n
entities.description: A workflow automation tool that ElizaOS is developing a similar system to, used for chaining MCPs together.

entities.name: REVOX
entities.description: A company or entity collaborating with ElizaOS to provide AI agents with human-like avatars.

entities.name: Kenk
entities.description: A user providing information about the development of ElizaOS's public agent directory and map.

entities.name: Collab.land
entities.description: A verification service that has experienced issues, leading to suggestions of switching to Vulcan.xyz.

entities.name: jin
entities.description: A user who raised concerns about Collab.land verification issues and suggested a switch.

entities.name: Vulcan.xyz
entities.description: A suggested alternative to Collab.land for verification services, due to Collab.land being considered 'janky'.

entities.name: OpenRouter
entities.description: A service that announced a temporary issue with their Generations API endpoint.

entities.name: Cloudflare
entities.description: A company providing CDN and security services, whose problems caused a temporary issue with OpenRouter's API endpoint.

entities.name: Quantum
entities.description: A technology or entity powering 'Pump This Page', featuring quantitative and executional agents.

entities.name: EIP-8004
entities.description: A proposal or standard being considered for potential integration with ElizaOS.

entities.name: x402
entities.description: A payment rail system with which ElizaOS is integrating MCPs for monetization.

entities.name: Motzl
entities.description: A user who confirmed that $ai16z is the main token of the ElizaOS project.

entities.name: Docker
entities.description: A platform for containerization, within which ElizaOS is developing an MCP catalog.

entities.name: REVOX
entities.description: A company or entity collaborating with ElizaOS to provide AI agents with human-like avatars.

entities.name: DEVA platform
entities.description: A platform associated with REVOX, used to give ElizaOS-powered AI agents human-like avatars with personality and emotion.
